div.pre: 887 Malomir, c. 30 km. S of Sumen, Bul- garia, 1965 Burial: c. 190 B.C. (Price) Contents: 23+AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 13 tetradr., chiefly late post. (Amphipolis, Mesembria, Cal- latis, Odessus, Asia Minor) 2 dr. Philip III: 1 dr. Lysimachus: 5 tetradr., some late post. (Calchedon 2) Attalid: 1 tetradr. Seleucus I: 1 tetradr. Disposition: private coll., Sumen, in part Gerasimov, BIAB 29 (1966), p. 212
